scripts.dev:full: npx concurrently "php artisan serve" "npm run dev" --names=laravel,vite --prefix=name
scripts.dev:complete: npx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fb7185,#fdba74" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "php artisan pail --timeout=0" "npm run dev" --names=server,queue,logs,vite
